Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Yeemene maraw!sheetan maaqattootii kee gititte makataatina usuk siinik naqboytak, kaadu sheetanti maaqattootii kee gititte kataate mari, toysa diggah usuk (sheetan kinnuk) elle amrisam qaxuma taamaa kee ceelewayto, kaadu Yallih muxxóo kee kay Racmat sin amol aneewannay inkinnah hebeltô num siinik saytunnoowak mananna abe dambik, kinnih immay Yalli dambik isih faxa mara saytunnoysa isi naqoosak, Yalli sin maxcoocá yaabbi, sin taamoomi yaaxigi

Kaadu diini muxxóo kee maali muxxó-le mari siinik xiibitewaay, mare-le maraa kee tudagoytiitiiy, Yallih gitih sabbatah dabbaye marah maaluk keenih acuwak sugeenim keenih aceewoonuwaanamal xiibite woonay usun baahen dambih sabbatah, kaadu usun umaanek abeenimik qafu keenih aboonay, baaheenim keenih caboonay ken elle digaalewoonay moominiiney Yalli dambi siinih cabam makicintoonuv? Yalli isi Naqoosah dambi cabtili keenih xuwawli kinnik
Diggah say-moominiiniy dalwak texxeerey wohuk garcit tanil dalwa haa mari, addunyaay akeeral abbarsimeeniih, Yallih Racmatak yexxeereenih, kaadu akeeral kaxxa digaalá lon
Woo digaalá ken geytam Qhiyaamah ayró, ken arroobuuy, ken gaboobii kee ken ibitte keenil sumaaqitta ayro abak sugeeniih, axcuk sugeenimil
Too ayró Yalli aben taamal ken galtó dudda luk keenih yacee cakkil, kaadu too waqdi diggah Yalli usuk cakki Yallay amri kak baxxaqqa-le kinnim yaaxigeenih

Agabuk uma agabi uma labhah iimiiy, labhak uma labha uma agabih iimi, kaadu agabuk meqe agbi meqe labhah iimiiy, labhak meqe labha meqe agabih iimi, woo meqe mari uma mari keenil haah keenik iyyaamak saytunnooweenih, usun dambi cabtii kee meqe Rizqhi (quusi) lon Jannatal
Yeemene maraw! isin sin Qarwa akkewayta Qarwa maculina, idini esserriiy, qarwa-le marah Salaamat abba haytaanam fanah, toh abtaanam maqaaneh siinih tayseh, Yallih amri kassita mara takkeenî gidah
